fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Each night, predict the fate of a player.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You will know who each of your targets visits every night. If you have multiple targets, who visited who will not be distinguished.
- If you're lynched, all the players that you selected will have their roles revealed publicly the next day.
- Evil roles will be notified that they were targeted by an Oracle.
